Name: IronCannonLauncherPoint
Notes: A point that periodically launches bullets that damage players and compatible objects upon contact.

Obj_arg0.Name: Launch Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: The delay between shots. Default is 300.

Obj_arg1.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg1.Description: How fast each bullet moves. Default is 30.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will only shoot bullets while this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
